post.author: NX-317
post.body: Apparently, Human Head Studios were going to give the evil spirit ability to possess Tommy's body. This feature was implemented, but then cancelled. You can still access it through the console.

post.author: hogsy
post.body: I'm surprised this had not been found already as it's certainly very interesting.

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
Yeah, I searched the Internet before posting and it surprised me too, because so many years have passed, but it still wasn't found.

Back in the day, I was thinking about using this in my Surprisingly Focused map, but couldn't find a way to input a console command through the script, so I abandoned this idea.
